Java SE 14 & JDK 14
DRAFT 14-crac+0-adhoc..jdk

Uses of Class
java.awt.MenuItem

Packages that use MenuItem 
Package Description
java.awt
Contains all of the classes for creating user interfaces and for painting graphics and images.

  • Uses of MenuItem in java.awt

    Subclasses of MenuItem in java.awt 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CheckboxMenuItem
    This class represents a check box that can be included in a menu.
    class  Menu
    A Menu object is a pull-down menu component that is deployed from a menu bar.
    class  PopupMenu
    A class that implements a menu which can be dynamically popped up at a specified position within a component.
    Methods in java.awt that return MenuItem 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MenuItem Menu.add​(MenuItem mi)
    Adds the specified menu item to this menu.
    MenuItem Menu.getItem​(int index)
    Gets the item located at the specified index of this menu.
    MenuItem MenuBar.getShortcutMenuItem​(MenuShortcut s)
    Gets the instance of MenuItem associated with the specified MenuShortcut object, or null if none of the menu items being managed by this menu bar is associated with the specified menu shortcut.
    Methods in java.awt with parameters of type MenuItem 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MenuItem Menu.add​(MenuItem mi)
    Adds the specified menu item to this menu.
    void Menu.insert​(MenuItem menuitem, int index)
    Inserts a menu item into this menu at the specified position.
